title: Sadiq Khan – 2022 Comments on “Government’s Anti-London Rhetoric”
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London, on 30 May 2022.
content:
I fear that the Government’s anti-London approach could seriously exacerbate the cost-of-living crisis.
